Date_must_be_in_the_following_year: Date must be in the following year:
End_date_must_be_greater_than_the_start_: End date must be greater than the start date.
Start_date_must_be_smaller_than_the_end_: Start date must be smaller than the end date.
Ask_manager_or_admin: If you wish to cancel a request that is in the past, please contact an Admin or Manager to proceed with cancellation.
Ask_admin: You cannot cancel requests that are in the past. Please contact an Admin to proceed with cancellation.
Cancel_request_reason_hint: Enter a reason why you want to cancel the request.
Decline_request_reason_hint: Enter a reason why you want to decline the request.
Reason_is_mandatory: You have to give a reason!
The_contingent_is_not_enough_for_the_req: The contingent is not enough for the request!
chat_button_message: Hi, I have a question about your leave request.
linear-all-must-agree_description: Approvers are contacted consecutively. If at least one denies the request, it will not be approved.
linear-one-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted consecutively. If at least one approves the request, it will be approved.
parallel-all-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted at the same time. If at least one denies the request, it will not be approved.
parallel-one-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted at the same time. If at least one approves the request, it will be approved.
error_mail: Error occurred while trying to send mail
no_access: No eligible person found for approval.
same-timezone: {{otherUserName}} is in the same timezone as you.
timezone-ahead: {{otherUserName}}'s timezone ({{utc}}) is {{hours}} hours ahead of you.
Outside_of_schedule: Be advised that you are requesting leave outside of the working hours.
TryAgainTextMessage: An error has occurred, please try again
group_booking_required_business_plan: You need at least a Business Plan to create group requests.
Name: Name
